mapper.select: SELECT * FROM music WHERE music.title LIKE '%${title}%' -- ORDER BY music.title desc

SELECT m.music_id AS music_id, m.title AS title, m.singer AS singer, m.composer AS composer, m.profile_img AS profile_img, count(*) AS cnt FROM music m LEFT JOIN record r ON m.music_id = r.music_id WHERE m.title LIKE '%${title}%' GROUP BY m.music_id ORDER BY cnt DESC
SELECT * FROM music WHERE title LIKE '%${title}%' ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT DISTINCT mu.* FROM member m INNER JOIN record r ON m.member_id = r.member_id INNER JOIN music mu ON r.music_id = mu.music_id WHERE m.username = #{username}
SELECT DISTINCT mu.* FROM member m INNER JOIN record r ON m.member_id = r.member_id INNER JOIN music mu ON r.music_id = mu.music_id WHERE m.username = #{username} AND r.access = true
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO music (music_id, title, profile_img, singer, composer) VALUES (#{music_id}, #{title}, #{profileImgUrl}, #{singer},#{composer})
